SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class AdminTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.AdminTest
public class AdminTest extends Object
Unit tests for Admin.

These tests run fully on the JVM and synchronously. They prevent real Firebase initialization by statically mocking FirebaseDatabase.getInstance(String), stub RTDB references, and short-circuit Task continuations to avoid any main-thread or network dependencies.

Behaviours verified

  • deleteEvent and deleteUserProfile issue deletes only for non-empty IDs
  • deleteOrganizerProfile returns an exception task for empty IDs and completes on success
  • browseEntrants builds lightweight User objects from snapshot keys
  • browseEvents returns a list whose size matches snapshot children

Technique

  • Static mock of FirebaseDatabase to block SDK initialization
  • Manual triggering of continuation lambdas for continueWithTask
  • Mockito stubs for DatabaseReference chains and completion listeners

All assertions are synchronous and deterministic.

User stories handled

  • US 03.01.01 - deleteEvent()
  • US 03.02.01 - deleteUserProfile()
  • US 03.02.01 - deleteOrganizerProfile()
  • US 03.04.01 - browseEvents()
  • US 03.05.01 - browseUsers()
  • US 03.06.01 - browseOrganizers() / browseImages() (if implemented)
  • US 03.07.01 - banUserFromOrganizer() / deleteOrganizerProfile()
  • US 03.08.01 - Notification-related tasks (ban/unban user notifications)
